summary:
This is my first mod and my first retexture :D.
The images that i posted are not great but if you would try the mod out you would get a much better result.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is something i made because i did not like the other mods for spellbreaker i found on the nexus.
There shouldn't be any compatibility problems with any mod, except mods that change spellbreaker textures ore mesh.
But if you have a problem with my mod just ask and i will try to help as best as i can.
I added a glow map to the spellbreaker that means that it has a glow effect but doesn't not emit light like a torch.
If someone dose not like how it looks like with the glow map i Can make a version without it.
The textures are all 2048x2048 but sinc its only one shield there will not be any performance drops.
author: TheEye
